Medal of Valor is Sgt.

1221.42.text:
served a search

1233.20.text:
Agents Kasey Burrell and

1240.47.text:

1243.08.text:

1247.51.text:

able to get both agents

1325.02.text:

1336.74.text:

1341.91.text:
Russell, he kept the flames

1350.95.text:

1361.36.text:

2318.62.text:
Female Speaker: The next

2325.22.text:

2328.79.text:
On November 12, 2012, the
Bellmore Fire Department was

2332.46.text:
called to a house fire where
a victim was trapped inside.

2335.77.text:
Along with his son,
former Chief Curley,

2339.84.text:
who remains a member of the
Bellmore Fire Department,

2341.84.text:
heard the call and
was first to arrive.

2343.84.text:
A man in the driveway
said that his elderly

2345.84.text:
mother was trapped in a
second floor bedroom.

2348.18.text:
With no fire vehicles on scene,
former Chief Curley used

2351.72.text:
a file cabinet topped by an
old broken ladder to climb

2356.35.text:
He broke the window
with his bare hands,

2358.69.text:
which exposed him to heavy black
smoke billowing from the room.

2362.46.text:
Without the protection of
a hose line, breathing

2365.13.text:
apparatus, or protective

2368.27.text:

2372.67.text:
Once inside, he found the
woman lying unconscious.

2375.34.text:
Former Chief Curley moved

2377.94.text:

2380.41.text:
her down, and passed her
to his waiting son,

2384.92.text:
Former Chief Curley suffered

2387.99.text:
face, and his actions taken at

2391.79.text:
safety resulted in saving the
life of the trapped woman.

2395.66.text:
Thank you and congratulations,

2465.00.text:
2013, by a man who had shot and

2469.43.text:

2472.30.text:

2475.64.text:

2482.75.text:
The agents determined that

2485.58.text:

2491.59.text:

2494.33.text:
less than five feet away,

2504.54.text:

2517.82.text:

2520.78.text:
The impact of the landing

2523.62.text:

2527.02.text:

2531.43.text:

2535.97.text:
